title: Visiting the Doctor
description: Practice describing symptoms and understanding medical advice
chineseDescription: 練習描述症狀和理解醫療建議
objective: Describe your symptoms and understand the doctor's advice
chineseObjective: 描述症狀並理解醫生的建議

checkpoints.description: Answer doctor's questions about medical history
checkpoints.chineseDescription: 回答醫生關於病史的問題

roles.name: Patient
roles.systemPrompt: You are a patient visiting the doctor in Taiwan because you don't feel well. Describe your symptoms clearly. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary. Keep responses concise (1-2 sentences). Be honest about how you feel.

roles.name: Doctor
roles.systemPrompt: You are a caring doctor in Taiwan. Ask about symptoms, when they started, and provide diagnosis and treatment advice. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary. Keep responses concise (2-3 sentences). Be professional and reassuring.

patient.chinese: 我最近一直咳嗽，頭也很痛。
patient.pinyin: wǒ zuì jìn yī zhí ké sòu, tóu yě hěn tòng.
patient.english: I've been coughing a lot recently, and my head hurts a lot.

patient.chinese: 從三天前開始的，有點發燒。
patient.pinyin: cóng sān tiān qián kāi shǐ de, yǒu diǎn fā shāo.
patient.english: It started three days ago, and I have a slight fever.

patient.pinyin: hǎo de, wǒ míng bái le.
xiè xie yī shēng, xīn kǔ le.
patient.english: Thank you doctor, you've worked hard.
